mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT S.id,S.businessKey,S.code,S.createOrgId,S.createOrgName,S.createUserCode,S.createUserId,S.createUserName,S.delegationState,S.duration,S.endActivityId,S.endActivityName,S.endTime,S.executionId,S.iscg,S.previousAssignee,S.previousAssigneeDate,S.previousAssigneeName,S.previousAssigneeOrgId,S.previousAssigneeOrgName,S.previousAssigneeUniqueCode,S.processDefinitionId,S.processDefinitionKey,S.processDefinitionName,S.processInstanceId,S.startActivityId,S.startActivityName,S.startTime,RES.ASSIGNEE_ as taskAssignee,RES.ID_ as taskId,RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskKey,RES.NAME_ as taskName,RES.OWNER_ as taskOwner,RES.CREATE_TIME_ as taskStartTime,S.title,S.createTime,S.updateTime,S.lastTimeStamp,S.demandUserId,S.demandOrgId,S.act_parentId,S.enabled,S.removed,S.isparent,S.isStop,S.chargeUserCode,S.developUserCode FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES INNER JOIN act_business_status S ON res.PROC_INST_ID_=s.processInstanceId and s.iscg =0 and s.enabled = 1 AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ WHERE (RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{uniqueCode} OR (RES.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND (I.USER_ID_ = #{uniqueCode} OR I.GROUP_ID_ IN(SELECT g.GROUP_ID FROM sys_user_group g WHERE g.USER_ID = #{uniqueCode})))) ORDER BY S.taskStartTime DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT S.id) FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES INNER JOIN act_business_status S ON res.PROC_INST_ID_=s.processInstanceId and s.iscg =0 and s.enabled = 1 AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ WHERE (RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{uniqueCode} OR (RES.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND (I.USER_ID_ = #{uniqueCode} OR I.GROUP_ID_ IN(SELECT g.GROUP_ID FROM sys_user_group g WHERE g.USER_ID = #{uniqueCode}))))

SELECT DISTINCT S.id,S.businessKey,S.code,S.createOrgId,S.createOrgName,S.createUserCode,S.createUserId,S.createUserName,S.delegationState,S.duration,S.endActivityId,S.endActivityName,S.endTime,S.executionId,S.iscg,S.previousAssignee,S.previousAssigneeDate,S.previousAssigneeName,S.previousAssigneeOrgId,S.previousAssigneeOrgName,S.previousAssigneeUniqueCode,S.processDefinitionId,S.processDefinitionKey,S.processDefinitionName,S.processInstanceId,S.startActivityId,S.startActivityName,S.startTime,RES.ASSIGNEE_ as taskAssignee,RES.ID_ as taskId,RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskKey,RES.NAME_ as taskName,RES.OWNER_ as taskOwner,RES.CREATE_TIME_ as taskStartTime,S.title,S.createTime,S.updateTime,S.lastTimeStamp,S.demandUserId,S.demandOrgId,S.act_parentId,S.enabled,S.removed,S.isparent,S.isStop,S.chargeUserCode,S.developUserCode FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES INNER JOIN act_business_status S ON res.PROC_INST_ID_=s.processInstanceId and s.iscg =0 and s.enabled = 1 and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%usertask_experts%" and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%wrv.%" and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%usertask8" and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%usertask1" AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ WHERE (RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{uniqueCode} OR (RES.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND (I.USER_ID_ = #{uniqueCode} OR I.GROUP_ID_ IN(SELECT g.GROUP_ID FROM sys_user_group g WHERE g.USER_ID = #{uniqueCode})))) ORDER BY S.taskStartTime DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT S.id) FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES INNER JOIN act_business_status S ON res.PROC_INST_ID_=s.processInstanceId and s.iscg =0 and s.enabled = 1 and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%usertask_experts%" and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%wrv.%" and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%usertask8" and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ not like "%usertask1" AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ WHERE (RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{uniqueCode} OR (RES.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND (I.USER_ID_ = #{uniqueCode} OR I.GROUP_ID_ IN(SELECT g.GROUP_ID FROM sys_user_group g WHERE g.USER_ID = #{uniqueCode}))))

SELECT * FROM act_business_status s WHERE s.createUserCode=#{uniqueCode} AND iscg=0 AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) and s.startTime >= #{startTime} and s.startTime <= #{endTime}
and s.endTime is null and s.endTime is not null and s.isstop is null and s.isstop = 1 AND enabled=1 AND act_parentId is null ORDER BY S.startTime DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_business_status s WHERE s.createUserCode=#{uniqueCode} AND iscg=0 AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) and s.startTime >= #{startTime} and s.startTime <= #{endTime} and s.endTime is null and s.endTime is not null and s.isstop is null and s.isstop = 1
AND enabled=1 AND act_parentId is null

SELECT * FROM act_business_status s WHERE s.createUserCode=#{uniqueCode} AND iscg=1 AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) AND enabled=1 ORDER BY S.createTime DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_business_status s WHERE s.createUserCode=#{uniqueCode} AND iscg=1 AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${code}','%' ) AND s.title like CONCAT('%','${title}','%' ) AND s.code like CONCAT('%','${processDefinitionKeys}','%' ) AND enabled=1
